subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Brian Rolston and Mark Parrish scored second-period goals and Josh Harding had a career-high 37 saves last night as the unbeaten Minnesota Wild beat the host Anaheim Ducks, 2-0..
snippet: Brian Rolston and Mark Parrish scored second-period goals and Josh Harding had a career-high 37 saves last night as the unbeaten Minnesota Wild beat the host Anaheim Ducks, 2-0..
